ingredients.item: ½ x 28g pack fresh coriander, roughly chopped
150g pack Waitrose Honey & Soy Smoked Mackerel Fillets, skinned, deboned and broken into chunks

instructions.step: Place the rice, soya beans and chilli flakes in a small saucepan and add 400ml of water. Bring to the boil and simmer, covered, for 14-15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the salad onions 2 minutes before the end of cooking; add the coriander.
Divide the rice between 2 bowls, drizzle over the teriyaki sauce. Top with mackerel and serve garnished with red chilli.
